boundary_scanner_type.description: Specifies how to break the highlighted fragments.

num_of_fragments.description: The maximum number of fragments to return.

fragment_size.description: The size of the highlighted fragment in characters.

fragment_offset.description: Controls the margin from which you want to start highlighting.

pre_tag.description: HTML tag to use for the highlighted text. Use in conjunction with post_tag.

post_tag.description: HTML tag to use for the highlighted text. Use in conjunction with pre_tag.
